analysis.description:
Slot.awardPrizes (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#355-382) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(2490000000000000) (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#376-377)
	- msg.sender.transfer(10000000000000) (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#378-381)

Slot.buyTicketsFor (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#315-330) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,numberOfTickets) (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#326)

Slot.awardPrizes has external calls inside a loop:
	- participants[gameNumber][winnerIndex % SIZE].transfer(prizes[i]) (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#368)

Slot.refundAll has external calls inside a loop:
	- participants[gameNumber][i].transfer(PRICE) (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#400-401)

Reentrancy in Slot.buyTicketsFor (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#315-330):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(beneficiary,numberOfTickets) (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#326)
	External calls sending eth:
	- addParticipant(beneficiary,numberOfTickets) (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#326-328)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- counter (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#326-328)
	- gameNumber (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#326-328)
	- jackpot (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#326-328)
	- participants (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#326-328)

SlotTicket.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#247-248)
SlotTicket.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#246-247)
SlotTicket.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#248)
SlotTicket.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#248-249)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/18/0x48198311ac8d81929c0e67e00dfc789b706178e9.sol#354-355:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
